        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="95861" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="95861" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.94</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="200">200</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="62"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby</b> by <b>Sabrina Carpenter</b> is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. <b>Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby</b> was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Gil Clavien. Top notes are Cherry, Brown sugar, Plum and Apple; middle notes are Dark Chocolate, Red Poppy, Vanilla Orchid and Peony; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Amber, Musk, Patchouli and Resin. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Cherry Baby by Sabrina Carpenter is the third fragrance in her Sweet Tooth collection with Scent Beauty. This Eau De Parfum features a blend of cherry cosmo, glazed apple, plum nectar, brown sugar, red poppy, peony blossom, dark chocolate, vanilla orchid, cashmere wood, sensual musk, patchouli elixir, and amber resin. The fragrance is presented in a red, chocolate bar-shaped bottle, mirroring the design of the other perfumes in the collection.</p>

<p>"Cherry Baby: A Flirty, Addictive Fragrance</p>

<p>Let the indulgent aroma of cherries and chocolate envelop you, swirling in a flirty mist of red poppy and peony. Feel the addictive embrace of vanilla orchid and the whisper of sensual musk as it caresses your skin, leaving a trail of seduction in its wake."</p>

<p>Sabrina Carpenter said: <em>“I wanted my new fragrance to be unexpected but something upscale and sophisticated while still feeling playful and provocative. Cherry Baby is timeless and flirty which encourages letting the sultry, glamorous side of you show in the best way possible.”</em></p>

<p>Available in 75 ml Eau de Parfum as a sa body mist.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span>Designer Sabrina Carpenter</span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.76824.jpg"alt="Sweet Tooth Sabrina Carpenter" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Sabrina Carpenter</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Sweet Tooth</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.84095.jpg"alt="Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream Sabrina Carpenter" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Sabrina Carpenter</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="95861"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>2.51</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="95861"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>1.67</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2353871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="loutuseys"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1936774.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="loutuseys" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-Est-Belle-14982.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14982.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie Est Belle"title="La Vie Est Belle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936774">loutuseys</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732005950" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled like wine?????? Gonna be honest, I tried to like it but I just don't.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2353871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2353871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346806" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="infble"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2313736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="infble" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346806ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346806" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313736">infble</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening smells just like cherry lipgloss for kids or a fizzy, artificial cherry drink, like non-alcoholic champagne. Overall, definitely reminds me of childhood. In my opinion, the scent gets better as you let it dry down a bit, that’s when I get the sugar and plum notes. I personally can’t smell much of the chocolate that’s listed in the notes, I was hoping for it to be a much more rich, chocolatey and creamy gourmand - it’s a bit too fruity and juvenile for me. The longevity, similarly to her other two fragrances, isn’t the best. The perfume is complex and pleasant enough for me to buy the full bottle once I’m done with my sample, but I’d say it’s my least favorite Sabrina fragrance so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2346806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2346806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346702" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hellsgemini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314674.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="hellsgemini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346702ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346702" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674">hellsgemini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was the most excited to try this scent out of the whole collection. Unfortunately, this was an absolute miss for me. The opening is extremely sour to me. Very rotten/bitter. After it dries down, it becomes a bearable warm cherry with the original Sweet Tooth base, but it might last for 30 minutes max. Just not worth it to me when their are better cherry scents out there. <br />
<br />
The notes sound so nice, but this just wasn't the one for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2346702"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2346702#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344409" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dspire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1409406"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dspire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"title="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1409406">dspire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m not a huge fan of cherry perfumes because they often remind me of cough syrup. However, Cherry Baby is a softer musky cherry to my nose. It seems to mix well with my skin chemistry and actually last a good 4 hours. It’s a good cool weather cherry scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2344409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2344409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="svalerie01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2300007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2300007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="svalerie01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fine-ry/Without-A-Trace-91430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Without A Trace"title="Without A Trace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2300007">svalerie01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 12:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first cherry-based perfume I've ever tried! Initially, I was a bit concerned because the opening had a cough syrup-like smell, almost like rotten cherries. Thankfully, it developed into a juicy, sour cherry scent that doesn’t come across as too synthetic. The base notes add an elegant edge, and the dark chocolate, floral, and other fruity notes complement it beautifully. It’s sweet (but not overly so) and smooth, with a hint of freshness to my nose. It feels perfect for the holidays! Overall, I like it, though I tend to be easily impressed. The projection and longevity are a bit weak, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2343377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2343377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936292">SublimeUtopia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 09:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is your perfect, bright, fun, winter casual scent. I smell cherries and dark chocolate. I layered this with Sweet like candy body spray for a fun combo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2342091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2342091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341914" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnlisaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnlisaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Bianco-Latte-64757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bianco Latte"title="Bianco Latte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341914ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341914" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/491">AnlisaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to say not bad at all. Is it TF LC no but close. I got it at FN for a great price. All around a sweet cherry but not in my opinion childish. Longevity is very good for a celebrity fragrance. I smell the plum and brown sugar on my skin. Sillage got me one compliment. Not bad when no one ever says anything about my fragrances. Cherry does well on my skin it never goes in the cough syrup realm thank God. Although I can see if you are not a sweet lover this can cause a headache. I did moisturize with Jergens original cream which has a cherry scent. Worked perfect. 9/10 recommended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2341914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2341914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341691" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zethre"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262397"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1262397.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zethre" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Amazone-1974-4656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amazone (1974)"title="Amazone (1974)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341691ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341691" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262397">Zethre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 01:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The cherry gives this vastly better sillage than the other 2 sweet tooths. Sweet cherry with a touch of vanilla and maybe chocolate. Much more feminine than Tom Ford's Lost Cherry.<br />
<br />
Not as good or strong as Dua Cherry Custard Cake</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2341691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2341691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341675" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Original-69010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Original"title="Dior Homme Original"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 01:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lots of candy-like cherry in the initial spray, which fades over the course of about 40 minutes into more of a brown sugared floral with a hint of dark chocolate. Ultimately fades out into a warm, musky patchouli with a touch of incense. Very sweet to begin with, but that dissipates quickly leaving a more bittersweet overall impression. It’s a scent that stays quite close, but unfortunately doesn’t really last on my skin beyond a couple of hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2341675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2341675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ghostori"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2108374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ghostori" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108374">ghostori</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cherry cordial in a bottle. I’m not getting the distinct bitterness or sourness that others are smelling. This is a sweet, sweet cherry, as to be expected from the sweet tooth line. It’s boozy too, and I can’t decide if this counts as a sexy frag or a very young, candy-like one.<br />
<br />
This is what I imagine Jessica Rabbit smells like. Sexy in a cartoony way. An exaggerated fragrance that leaves you wanting more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2340349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2340349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340212" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340212" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="magp1e"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2279544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="magp1e" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"title="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340212ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340212" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279544">magp1e</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is on one end of a spectrum of perfumes I like. It starts sweet and stays sweet. What I think other reviews are failing to mention is that as it warms as it dries. It is a subtle but noticeable shift towards something like a cherry pie that makes you question "is there cinnamon in this? nutmeg maybe?".<br />
<br />
The bottle and packaging are very on brand for the vibe of the fragrance, it feels fun and silly without feeling cheap or novelty. It sits nicely in the collection (though I haven't sampled the other, I have seen the packaging and they are cohesive yet distinct).<br />
<br />
It is unavoidably young with its immediate tart/sour notes, and its borderline sickly sweetness. But if you like that sort of thing you will love this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2340212"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2340212#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siv7Stars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.47621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siv7Stars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Fire-At-Will-70289.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70289.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fire At Will"title="Fire At Will"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47621">Siv7Stars</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 02:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very surprising. Expected something dark (dark choc note obvs) but got fizzy cherryade, finely fizzy like eating cherry cola bottle sweets. Really not my cup of tea at all. Sourish like a Haribo Tangfastic. This was as far as I went before washing it off sorry. Absolutely not like other cherry frags I've smelled though, so possibly worth checking if you really like cherry as a note as the opening of this is definitely different.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2336419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2336419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336084" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336084" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mindzy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144687"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1144687.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mindzy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cartier/La-Panthere-Elixir-96872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Panthere Elixir"title="La Panthere Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336084ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336084" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144687">mindzy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 17:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I found it to be quite childish in a charming way. The fragrance is delightful, reminiscent of a fresh, fluffy cherry cordial. It’s an ideal gift for my niece and the girls next door. While it has minimal sillage, it lasts about three hours on my skin. Overall, the entire line is pleasant and offered at an excellent price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2336084"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2336084#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening was fruitier but went away fairly quickly. For the most part, it's a light musk and sweet dark chocolate. I wouldn't get this if you're looking for something heavy on the cherry</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2330515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2330515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327654" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="noodlehead19"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1277444.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="noodlehead19" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Coco-Vanille-42782.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42782.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Vanille"title="Coco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327654ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327654" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277444">noodlehead19</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>like a spiced cherry cordial - chocolaty, fruity, just a little boozy. the cherry is prominent, but to me it's sweetened and syrupy, like a jar of bright red maraschinos. on me, it smells very spicy; the chocolate note is bolstered by the patchouli/woody base. despite being the star of the show, the fruity notes give way very quickly to the gourmand bit of the fragrance. it would be the perfect fall fragrance, for day or night, if only it lasted more than 2 hours. I like how it's different from the first two Sweet Teeth though. it's cheap enough to overspray/reapply, but it can be sneeze-inducing in large quantities.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2327654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2327654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324934" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ariadnelake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ariadnelake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Vanilla-Suede-96257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Suede"title="Vanilla Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324934ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324934" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221401">ariadnelake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens up way too sweet for me, and I love gourmand scents. I felt like it was quite childish and regretted putting it on for the first 30 minutes, after about 4 hours I really like the dry down but that's a long time to suffer. My favourite of this range is the Caramel one. I'd rather wear Lovefest by Kayali if I'm looking for something cherry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2324934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2324934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232228">Joani_Cheddar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just because it has a note of cherry doesn't mean it smells like Tom Ford Lost Cherry.  Oye!  Yes the cherry is sour like TF, - this also has a plum note that stands out.  It is a tart fruit sweet fruit combo done in a fluffy airy way. TF is rum boozy this is wine like.  Very good for a celebrity fragrance. Her whole line is done well and at a great price point. This is similar to Bohoboco Red Wine Brown Sugar but in a teen setting. I like it. RATED Wine out of Ten</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2320626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2320626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320573" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hysteria1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081331.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hysteria1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Yara-Candy-95752.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95752.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yara Candy"title="Yara Candy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081331">hysteria1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 04:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I picked this up when i saw it in store, I love anything cherry scented and also really enjoyed the original SC sweet tooth fragrance. It opens up smelling very floral cherry on me, a bit smokey even, then after ten or so minutes It smelt like those brandy ball sweets (Old style sweet from the UK), cant for the life of me see where that is coming from in the notes but it definitely smelled like that on my skin. <br />
<br />
It dried down after 10 or so minutes to smell like what I guess to be the TF Lost cherry scent, I only ever had a copy from the fragrance vault so I cant compare to the actual TF one.<br />
 <br />
Overall it is a rollercoaster of a scent on me, it isn't overly sickly sweet but id definitely smell this in store before picking it up.<br />
<br />
Ill give it a 7/10, it didn't last that long to be honest and the scent throw wasn't great either, I love the packaging its pretty cute, although a strange shade of red to choose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It opens up smelling of cherry wine, still very sweet and candy-leaning. The dry down you can smell more of the florals and marshmallow. It reminds me of wild cherry picking and fruit wine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2304191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2304191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anamawsity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anamawsity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817">anamawsity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 16:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>By far my favourite cherry scent as most others are way too sour for me. This is a super sweet and fluffy cherry fragrance. It’s similar to other cherry fragrances (ie. Lost Cherry, Lovefest Burning Cherry, Cherry Ambition, etc) but much creamier and nowhere near as tart or boozey. The most similar perfume I’ve tried is Fine’ry Not Another Cherry, but even that is more of a boozey sour cherry than this. I thankfully don’t get any patchouli or florals, just cherry, brown sugar, and a bit of apple and amber. Has minimal sillage and lasts about 3 hours on me. In terms of perfumes listed as similar—<br />
❌ Sabrina’s Sweet Tooth: a light vanilla with a hint of coconut, not fruity at all<br />
❌ YSL Black Opium Over Red: much more focused on vanilla, the cherry is an afterthought</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2300530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2300530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298759" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maryannegrace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maryannegrace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311193">maryannegrace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 05:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a decant of this as I was afraid of blind-buying it. I have the original Sweet Tooth and Caramel Dream and I love them (the original more than Caramel). However, I'm not really fond of cherry smelling things so I just decided to try it. <br />
<br />
The opening smells like wine which makes it alluring. As it dries down, you get more of the warmth (probably from the amber and cashmere?). I am still not sold on whether I would get the full size (or maybe the body spray only) or maybe none at all. I like smelling it on my wrist though but not sure if I like it enough to shell out $30. <br />
<br />
Does it smell cheap? I don't know because I've never owned anything more expensive than a designer fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2298759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2298759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291981" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eridanshay1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.3828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eridanshay1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Usher/Femme-by-Usher-52226.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52226.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Femme by Usher"title="Femme by Usher"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291981ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291981" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3828">Eridanshay1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 20:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you’re on the fence, Please, Please, Please give it a shot.<br />
<br />
I don’t think it’s cheap smelling. I purchased it for my mom who loved &amp; mourned the death of Cherry Vanilla by Parfums de Vanille (see my old review). To me, it has more depth than TF’s Lost Cherry which imho is over priced/hyped. It’s fun. It’s warm. It’s not sexy but is alluring &amp; for certain is 2 steps above BBW delusive cherry anything. <br />
<br />
I recently made a batch of “copy cat” discontinued Taco Bell Caramel Apple Empanadas (iykyk). ALL the FALL feels…cinnamon, vanilla, gooey OG Kraft caramels, tart apples, blistered, crispy deep fat fried buttery crust…<br />
<br />
If you could take the smell of my kitchen after making them, raised a toast to (most of) the recent lead balloon releases of cherry scents w/a tiny goblet of Kirsch (back of liquor cabinet f/ NYE for the cheese fondue), mixed w/Abuelita Mexican spicy hot cocoa, then add Luden’s Cherry cough drops c.1979, (the CANDY that some kids, who had phenomenal parents, brought to primary school w/a permission slip stating they simply must have cherry lozenges, Aspergum, &amp; a Vick’s menthol sniff-a-stick)…<br />
you would have the smell of this. <br />
<br />
Warm, totally weird, somehow intimately sweet, slightly medicinal, &amp; to me, comfortingly familiar.<br />
<br />
If you like Bodycology Fireside S’more body spray, Cherry Vanilla, Liliya Vogue Cherry, Al Rehab’s Love Apple or Choco Musk, Mariah Carey’s M, Jergen’s Original Cherry Almond, JS’s Fancy, or Coty Ici, you may enjoy this. <br />
<br />
Thanks for reading my review. <br />
🌷🫶🏻 xo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2291981"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2291981#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284563" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780780">natihalm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet cherry candy with that fluffy marshmallow base from the original. I like it, it’s cute and playful however on me I’m getting less than 30 mins longevity even with over spraying. And for $30 for 1oz, I was expecting a little more than that!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2284563"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2284563#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
