Smells like grandmas house.Kind of smells like Ludens cough drops but that goes away quick</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2279196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2279196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277346" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fauxmantis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fauxmantis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363562">fauxmantis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 16:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this overall, but unfortunately the cherry note doesn’t last very long, and after that you’re kind of just left with Sweet Tooth. Which I love, but I don’t need both</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2277346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2277346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276837" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="halohank"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2245236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2245236.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="halohank" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2245236">halohank</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is...just okay. The best thing about it is the adorable bottle. The opening is a nice strong syrupy cherry scent. I don't detect chocolate at all, which I was fine with. However, the dry down is mostly just a one dimensional aquatic note that I generally associate with cheap perfumes. There is no complexity here. A very immature fragrance that I'll probably end up giving to my much younger sister.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2276837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2276837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274115" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Creamy_ambrette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640057.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Creamy_ambrette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Millesime-Tonka-76063.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76063.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Millésime Tonka"title="Shalimar Millésime Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274115ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274115" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057">Creamy_ambrette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dunno, this just smells inexpensive. The opening is amazing sweet cherry then it becomes waxy - not in a good way, then muddled. 40 minutes later it smells tart and fermented No Patchouli, floral or anything to ground the composition. <br />
This is a miss.<br />
Not another cherry is far superior in scent, quality and performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2274115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2274115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sweetpunkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7163"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7163.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sweetpunkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-Intense-56761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her Intense"title="Burberry Her Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7163">sweetpunkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 22:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this yesterday; it basically smells like a lot of the other TF Lost Cherry Dupes that I have except Cherry Baby smells like a red tootsie pop to my nose. It's a cute scent but I wouldn't go out of my way to purchase it if you have other cherry fragrances in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2270802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2270802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260748" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karsie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2232258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2232258.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karsie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260748ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260748" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2232258">karsie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So so so so SAURRR disappointing … Upon first spray you get a sour apple smell that hits your nose really hard and lingers for a while. the dry down has small notes of cherry, but not enough to classify it as a “cherry” scented perfume. it smells like cheap chocolate covered cherries but if the chocolate was also mixed with cheap liquor once its dry. the longevity is so poor compared to sweet tooth, i can barely smell it on me after maybe an hour. i was so disappointed with this fragrance, it’s more apple than it is cherry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2260748"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2260748#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260725" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2232239">snekbabeh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just purchased this perfume today from my local Walmart supercenter. On initial spray it smells like one of those Christmas time BBW candles, which to me isn't a bad thing! As it dries down you get that original Sweet Tooth DNA, and it definitely smells like a more expensive fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2260725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2260725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This smells like one of my favorite treats, chocolate covered cherries. The bottle also gives me Lana Del Rey vibes, which is a plus. OMG, imagine this paired with Palmer's cocoa butter formula lotion and Dove cherry and chia milk body wash❤️🍒</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2258783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2258783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257331" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257331" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emjodway"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2117097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emjodway" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117097">emjodway</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Although it doesn’t necessarily smell like I imagined it would, I enjoy it and like it better than caramel dream. Heavy on the cherry, apple and floral notes. Don’t get much gourmand/chocolate/brown sugar from it, but that’s okay, makes it different from anything else I own. Not nearly as powdery/almond leaning as TF Lost Cherry. Can almost come off smelling dirty/earthy from the patchouli. Not mad that I bought it, the value is so great, 54.99 for the large size. Poor longevity but I don’t mind spraying on more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2257331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2257331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256356" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TgHall79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625400"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TgHall79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Badgley-Mischka/Audrey-78013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Audrey"title="Audrey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625400">TgHall79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 11:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have all 3 of the Sweet Tooth scents. I love the DNA of the first two and was expecting more of the same with a cherry twist when I bought this. It was a blind buy tbh. I don't not like this one, but I am not super thrilled to have it.<br />
The fluffy chocolate and marshmallow notes of the first two are my favorite things about the scents. This fragrance seems to be missing the fluffy airyness and cozy factor of the other two. I know EVERY SINGLE SOLITARY cherry scent, and there have been many, are being compared to Lost Cherry.  I won't compare these two because others have. I would compare it to Guess Seductive Red. <br />
The airy lightness of all the Baccarat clones is missing in Cherry Baby. The burned sugar and medicinal smell of office and latex is present. The cherry in the two scents are very similar to my nose. I also go anosmic to this scent pretty quickly. That does not happen with any other edition in the Sweet Tooth line. The sillage and lasting power of both are very similar. Cherry Baby and Seductive Red are not clones or.dupes of each other, but I don't think having both is necessary. <br />
<br />
As for just the scent itself, it is fine. I would not go out of my way to recommend it. I also would not repurchase. It is wearable and I might even finish the bottle. But these ugly bottles though. Someone needs to tell the truth. They are juvenile and ugly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2256356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2256356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253452" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rose_nymph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706783"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1706783.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rose_nymph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Sex"title="Vanilla Sex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706783">rose_nymph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was excited for this but it kind of let me down...<br />
The longevity is very weak. Projection is weak... <br />
I only smell a strong green apple scent with a dusty chocolate smell lingering after the initial spray. On first spray, it smells like a diluted and watered down dupe of Lost Cherry by Tom Ford, in the weakest sense. <br />
It is a lesson for me to not jump on the bandwagon of celebrity perfumes, because I feel all I have tested let me down. <br />
I don't ever reach for it. <br />
One thing I will say is, there is no alarmingly screeching alcohol smell. For the price point, I was kind of afraid of that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2253452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2253452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ellycube"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861075"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1861075.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ellycube" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861075">Ellycube</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 18:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first cherry fragrance and it's not what I was expecting. It smells like a chocolate covered boozy candy. The chocolate is almost overpowering the cherry! <br />
<br />
UPDATE:<br />
I've had this for a couple weeks now and it's really grown on me! The chocolate candy scent doesn't bother me anymore, and it very quickly transforms to a really delicious floral cherry. The scent is extremely strong for the first 30 minutes but then dies down pretty quickly and just the mid/base notes remain. After an hour or so I don't smell any of the top notes anymore, but it smells heavenly! And after 2-3 hours it's just a skin scent. I actually really really like this scent, the dry down is SO good! It's complex and rich, and the perfect summer into fall transition scent. Can't wait to wear it apple picking :)<br />
<br />
I heard people compare this to Fine'rys Not Another Cherry so I went to Target to spray it on one wrist and compare to Cherry Baby. I don't think they're similar at all!! Not Another Cherry has a very strong almond note that Cherry Baby doesn't have, thank God because I don't like how it smells. And the dry down is completely dissimilar too, the dry down in this perfume is so delicious and complex. Not Another cherry is a lot more linear and not very good IMO. I think the cherry in this perfume is stronger in the first 30 minutes too. <br />
<br />
I really wish this perfume lasted longer though. I keep reapplying throughout the day and in a couple hours it's gone :( I don't know if I'd repurchase for that reason.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2251745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2251745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248472" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Morphinx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1223161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Morphinx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Bianco-Latte-64757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bianco Latte"title="Bianco Latte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223161">Morphinx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 20:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sexy, flirty, and playful. Starts out like a fizzy cherry-flavored spiked fruit punch. The cherry is prominent for 45 minutes before becoming a background note. The dark chocolate note reminds me of those Godiva chocolates with the cherry inside. The florals lighten the fragrance and prevents it from going completely gourmand. The florals aren't invasive or offensive either; just nice supporting characters. The Sweet Tooth creamy-waxy DNA is slightly in here but instead of it being gourmand creamy-waxy, it's the makeup/lipstick kind. It later turns into a warm vaguely sweet floral scent in the end with a slight hint of cherry and patchouli. I normally hate patchouli but it's pretty light in this compared to Caramel Dream. Patchouli usually nauseates me but the amount in this doesn't trigger me. It just warms up the fragrance and makes it slightly spicy. To be honest, the ending smells a bit generic like a designer perfume or something you've already smelled before. Quite frankly, if you've smelled one cherry perfume, you've smelled it all. But I enjoy the fun, youthful, flirty, immature but not too juvenile nuance of this which makes me want to keep this in my collection compared to any TF Lost Cherry dupe. It doesn't take itself seriously, it's hyperfeminine, and the bottle is cute. Biggest downside is the longevity. It lasts the least compared to Sabrina's other fragrances (which lasts me a full day). 6 hours total but does not project well unless you're in a small enclosed space like a car. It becomes a skin scent pretty quickly (around half an hour in). You'll smell yourself but other people would have to be close to smell you. Overall, the og Sweet Tooth is still my top #1, while Cherry Baby and Caramel Dream are tied as #2. Now I just need her to come out with a perfume that's similar to the og Sweet Tooth but in a mocha espresso/coffee version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2248472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2248472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248444" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248444" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="REC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1960424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1960424.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="REC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248444ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248444" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1960424">REC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To preface this: I haven’t smelled any other cherry fragrances to compare this to. That said, I like this. The initial spray is tart, like sour candy. If I didn’t know this was cherry-based I’m not sure I would have pin-pointed it. Within the first 20 minutes it mellows into a fluffy sweet that does feel like cherry marshmallow cozy. I don’t know if it’s something I’ll wear much (Sweet Tooth is one of my cozy go-tos) but I like it. It was ~$30, it’s cute, I don’t think it deserves hate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2248444"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2248444#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248240" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Spencemonster"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/454785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.454785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Spencemonster" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oakcha/Watermelon-Jam-93078.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93078.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Watermelon Jam"title="Watermelon Jam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/454785">Spencemonster</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Meh. <br />
Not bad. Not special at all. <br />
If you have lots of cherry scents (I do) this isn’t anything unique. Actually doesn’t even impress me. Doesn’t last. Did not wow me. I tried. But. Oh well. Sold it already. <br />
<br />
If you like cherry and don’t have many. I’d grab this if you want a cheapie. But. Not another cherry for the same price by Finery is better. 🥰👑</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2248240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2248240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248097" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lady Patches"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2025491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lady Patches" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248097ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248097" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025491">Lady Patches</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is it good? Yes, the cherry is not like cough syrup or car scent. The notes blend well together<br />
<br />
MIGHT be too sweet for this weather(32°C), defo, that sugar, chocolate, is like eating one of those of those sweet chocolates that have a Cherry inside.<br />
<br />
The dry down is a soft floral cherry gourmand scent, approved. But i don't love it, maybe it will grow on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2248097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2248097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247685" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crystalistheone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="crystalistheone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Noir-Absolu-46420.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46420.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Noir Absolu"title="Valentino Donna Noir Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247685ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247685" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234486">crystalistheone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 06:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wasn’t expecting much, it arrived in the mail yesterday and I was pleasantly surprised it smells like a sweet cherry brandy, Lasted five hours on me, I purchased the perfume and the body spray for like $32 can’t complain it was cheap and somewhat decent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2247685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2247685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247359" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ArlissLux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1233841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ArlissLux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sorce/Snow-Moon-Magic-95264.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95264.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Snow Moon Magic"title="Snow Moon Magic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233841">ArlissLux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 21:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>another play doh fragrance but with cherry added. <br />
these are sold at walmart for a reason LOL</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2247359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2247359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mattesha Erotica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448070"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1448070.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mattesha Erotica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Hypnose-170.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.170.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnôse"title="Hypnôse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448070">Mattesha Erotica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot stand miss Carpenter and refrained from buying her other releases, but once I heard she had released a cherry fragrance, I thought we could put our differences aside like REAL women, and this would be my opportunity to finally give one of her perfumes a try. Just like others here, I was SWINDLED by tiktokers swooning about how great this is.<br />
<br />
This perfume smells like a girl getting ready. Sticky waxy 90s lipstick mixed with using a hair straightener on freshly conditioned hair. Besides that, I cant put my finger on a single distinguishable note; it all just smells so muddled and gross if i was honest. The cherry here isnt the fun sultry cherry I enjoy, but rather that lipstick-y type stuffy cherry. The best part about this is how it seems to evaporate in minutes and is undetectable within a half hour, so you’re not stuck smelling like a chocolate covered cherry gummy bear and burnt hair concoction for long thankfully. My cap and bottle seem to be two distinct different shades of red and the atomizer feels cheap. Like her discography, this is just not a quality product.<br />
<br />
I knew better than to get anything by miss Carpenter, but my love of cherry frags clouded my judgment. When I saw her perfume manufacturer also makes Dolly Parton/Whitney Houston fragrances I was afraid of a questionable, end cap of the perfume isle in a department store type fragrance, and thats exactly what this is. Not trying to be a hater, this is just a bad perfume. 😅</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2247154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2247154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246309" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kelhil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135046.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kelhil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Amore-Caffe-87409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amore Caffè"title="Amore Caffè"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046">kelhil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 20:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really excited from the Tiktok reviews I saw of people saying it smells less artificial than other cherry fragrances. I really don't know what they're smelling because to me, it smells more artificial than NAC by Finery and Lost Cherry by TF. That's not a bad thing, I like syrupy, cherry smells, but the cherry smell lasts approximately 30 minutes. After that, the only thing I get is a warm floral. It's much more floral than her other two, it doesn't seem to have the same base DNA in that if I didn't know it was part of the Sweet Tooth lineup, I probably wouldn't guess that. The warm floral lasts about 4 hours with moderate sillage on me, but it's very faintly on my skin 11 hours later. <br />
<br />
I did prep my skin with lotion prior to give it the best chance possible. I'm going to compare it to Lovefest Burning Cherry by Kayali because I suspect they might be similar, only I don't think CB has that same smoky note. Overall, I was disappointed because it doesn't wear all that well, even for a cheap fragrance. That's part of what I love about the first two. I think this completely missed the mark. <br />
<br />
ETA: Having smelled and now purchased YSL's Over Red, coming back to this fragrance is honestly painful. If you aren't a big Sabrina fan, I'd skip it entirely. There are so many other, better warm cherry fragrances out there. I'm only keeping it because I'm a fan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2246309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2246309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245990" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Johnunique1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/951135"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Johnunique1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/951135">Johnunique1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MALE PERSPECTIVE:<br />
I got my Cherry Baby!🍒🍫 perfume the big bottle from the site Scent Beauty!.  <br />
The scent is like the (Bath &amp; Body Works Chocolate Covered Cherry) but a little bit better in my opinion. I like it, to me it smells nice. Is not horrible. it smells like 2 things. Like those chocolate with cherry inside. And the other thing that reminds me of is like a velvety cherry chocolate cake if u can imagine it. lol. Saddly is not that strong, but it lingers very like a close to the skin. I wore it and i had to walk to my grandma i got there and the air fans were on in her house and she kept getting whiffs and she kept giving me compliments how good my perfume smelled. So that tells u something.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2245990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2245990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244346" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oiprocs80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1121763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1121763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oiprocs80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Escape-271.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.271.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escape"title="Escape"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1121763">oiprocs80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 19:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Check out your local Walmart. That's where I found mine. Packing super cute. As far as the fragrance the opening I get a fresh maschino cherry, similar to bbw merry cherry cheer or black cherry Merlot, followed by the scent of chocolate covered cherry filling and that's all I got for awhile. Hours later I kept getting a whiff of a very faint dry down, similar to Zara red temptation but way watered down. That's it. I like it but I won't repurchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2244346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2244346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vicky456"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vicky456" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387792">Vicky456</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 12:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From the bottle it smells exactly like a chocolate covered cherry, once you spray it that goes away unfortunately. In the air it smells like a subtly sweet apple with a kinda tart cherry, little sugary too and it stays like that in air. <br />
On my skin in the beginning it was a bit sharp, more citrus forward than expected. It was definitely that apple and cherry i got. More of a floral background with it, definitely more floral than her other 2. It gets powdery but not in the same ways the other 2 do, more of that amber floral powdery-ness. <br />
Sweet but not a gourmand sweet like her other 2. You get more of a spiciness with this one, especially in the beginning and the next 20 or so minutes. Roughly 40-50 minutes later, that cherry becomes more sweet it is less citrus and spicy like. A tad less powdery and that dark chocolate note starts to show up. It is not very prevalent, it stays more so in the base. The cherry does not smell medicinal at all by the way. That brown sugar shows up more but not upfront, it helps sweeten that cherry.<br />
I do think the patchouli might be very prominent for most people, it is also the lightest out of her fragrance but you do still get a nice little bubble around you.<br />
Now after an hour when it’s dried down a lot, it becomes more like a creamy amber scent, that amber is very prominent on my skin around this time. The cherry loses little bit of sweetness and stays a little tart. The dark chocolate and spice is still there, the florals die down a lot, they are still there but way less noticeable than before. <br />
Now something that may just be a me thing- after that hour it smells almost identical to the Very Vanilla lotion from VS PINK. I dont know what it is, but on my skin the dry down of that lotion and the fragrance at this point smell like 90% similar, maybe it’s the brown sugar in this and the cinnamon sugar in that very vanilla? Not bad, just was a little surprising lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2239763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2239763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910953">iceprincess1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 20:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this smells absolutely heavenly, like an expensive box of chocolates on Valentine’s Day. it’s light and powdery enough that it’s not offensive but still has enough sillage to be noticeable &lt;3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2238196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2238196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237089" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrgnliana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrgnliana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Unknown-Pleasures-17438.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17438.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Unknown Pleasures"title="Unknown Pleasures"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153169">mrgnliana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 16:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells very similar to finery’s not another cherry but a little less boozy. I smell little of the OG DNA in the dry down on skin, like amaretto and marshmallows. It’s pretty light and the lasting time on me is around 2-4 hours. I love the smell, but if you already have not another cherry, lost cherry, etc you don’t really need this one. I do like this way more than caramel dreams, but less than original sweet tooth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2237089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2237089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236904" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cinnamorollstef"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1820056.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cinnamorollstef" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Like Candy"title="Sweet Like Candy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820056">cinnamorollstef</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 13:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have never tried Tom Ford’s Lost Cherry, but I do have Oh, Cherry from bath and body works (lost Cherry dupe) and I must say that Cherry Baby smells very very similar to it if not the exact same. I did pick up a little bit of the chocolate, but this fragrance is very different from sweet tooth and caramel dream. I do like it, but I think I prefer the predecessors more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2236904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2236904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236730" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cyclone1391"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.666114.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cyclone1391" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114">cyclone1391</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 09:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very disappointed, linear synthetic cherry. Reminded me of Not Another Cherry but that scent is better imo. Not getting any chocolate or gourmand vibe at all. I personally don't detect any similarity to her other scents. I'm a fan of caramel dream and had high hopes for this, but it is sadly a flop.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2236730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2236730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rehderja"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406173"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406173.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rehderja" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);
