It’s okay. It’s like her other perfumes with a cherry hint. It gives me a play-doughy vibe. Wish it was a tad stronger.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2236143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2236143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233661" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233661" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Just A Touch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2021157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Just A Touch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tory-Burch/Bel-Azur-45570.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45570.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bel Azur"title="Bel Azur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233661ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233661" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021157">Just A Touch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m going to need someone here to report back if this is a dupe of Japanese Cherry Blossom. I was hoping this was more cherry forward. I really don’t need JCB as that olfactory memory has been seared into my brain by BBW girlies since the early 2000s…<br />
<br />
ETA: this is a 1:1 dupe of Finery’s Not Another Cherry. I’m kinda perplexed at the members stating that NAC is better because it is the exact same fragrance in different packaging. If you already have Not Another Cherry then don’t waste time (or money) with this. I’ll be looking into Cherry Punk for a rich, cherry scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2233661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2233661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233359" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lbustos2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2055934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lbustos2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Princess-90174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055934">Lbustos2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 23:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Cherry Baby. I’m a total fan of Tom Ford’s Lost Cherry and out of all of the different dupes that have been put out, this fragrance right here takes the cake. It Lost Cherry is out of your price range, trust that Cherry Baby will take care of you. It has the same maraschino cherry type of smell. It smells a bit powdery, gourmand, and almondy. Lost Cherry smells like powdery cherry almonds and so does Cherry Baby. Cherry Baby has exceeded my expectations. I do get a blast of Apple once I spray it, but it quickly dissipates into the most beautiful cloud of Cherry and almonds. A powdery cloud of Cherry and almonds. I 100% endorse Cherry Baby if you’re a fan of cherry, and want the best possible dupe of TF.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2233359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2233359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; </div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2258783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258783" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="salfisherswife"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2230309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2230309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="salfisherswife" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2230309">salfisherswife</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 15:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SABRINA CARPENTER READ MY MIND. This smells like one of my favorite treats, chocolate covered cherries. The bottle also gives me Lana Del Rey vibes, which is a plus. OMG, imagine this paired with Palmer's cocoa butter formula lotion and Dove cherry and chia milk body wash❤️🍒</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2258783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2258783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248472" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Morphinx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1223161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Morphinx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Bianco-Latte-64757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bianco Latte"title="Bianco Latte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223161">Morphinx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 20:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sexy, flirty, and playful. Starts out like a fizzy cherry-flavored spiked fruit punch. The cherry is prominent for 45 minutes before becoming a background note. The dark chocolate note reminds me of those Godiva chocolates with the cherry inside. The florals lighten the fragrance and prevents it from going completely gourmand. The florals aren't invasive or offensive either; just nice supporting characters. The Sweet Tooth creamy-waxy DNA is slightly in here but instead of it being gourmand creamy-waxy, it's the makeup/lipstick kind. It later turns into a warm vaguely sweet floral scent in the end with a slight hint of cherry and patchouli. I normally hate patchouli but it's pretty light in this compared to Caramel Dream. Patchouli usually nauseates me but the amount in this doesn't trigger me. It just warms up the fragrance and makes it slightly spicy. To be honest, the ending smells a bit generic like a designer perfume or something you've already smelled before. Quite frankly, if you've smelled one cherry perfume, you've smelled it all. But I enjoy the fun, youthful, flirty, immature but not too juvenile nuance of this which makes me want to keep this in my collection compared to any TF Lost Cherry dupe. It doesn't take itself seriously, it's hyperfeminine, and the bottle is cute. Biggest downside is the longevity. It lasts the least compared to Sabrina's other fragrances (which lasts me a full day). 6 hours total but does not project well unless you're in a small enclosed space like a car. It becomes a skin scent pretty quickly (around half an hour in). You'll smell yourself but other people would have to be close to smell you. Overall, the og Sweet Tooth is still my top #1, while Cherry Baby and Caramel Dream are tied as #2. Now I just need her to come out with a perfume that's similar to the og Sweet Tooth but in a mocha espresso/coffee version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2248472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2248472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237089" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrgnliana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrgnliana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Unknown-Pleasures-17438.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17438.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Unknown Pleasures"title="Unknown Pleasures"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153169">mrgnliana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 16:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells very similar to finery’s not another cherry but a little less boozy. I smell little of the OG DNA in the dry down on skin, like amaretto and marshmallows. It’s pretty light and the lasting time on me is around 2-4 hours. I love the smell, but if you already have not another cherry, lost cherry, etc you don’t really need this one. I do like this way more than caramel dreams, but less than original sweet tooth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2237089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2237089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ellycube"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861075"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1861075.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ellycube" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861075">Ellycube</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 18:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first cherry fragrance and it's not what I was expecting. It smells like a chocolate covered boozy candy. The chocolate is almost overpowering the cherry! <br />
<br />
UPDATE:<br />
I've had this for a couple weeks now and it's really grown on me! The chocolate candy scent doesn't bother me anymore, and it very quickly transforms to a really delicious floral cherry. The scent is extremely strong for the first 30 minutes but then dies down pretty quickly and just the mid/base notes remain. After an hour or so I don't smell any of the top notes anymore, but it smells heavenly! And after 2-3 hours it's just a skin scent. I actually really really like this scent, the dry down is SO good! It's complex and rich, and the perfect summer into fall transition scent. Can't wait to wear it apple picking :)<br />
<br />
I heard people compare this to Fine'rys Not Another Cherry so I went to Target to spray it on one wrist and compare to Cherry Baby. I don't think they're similar at all!! Not Another Cherry has a very strong almond note that Cherry Baby doesn't have, thank God because I don't like how it smells. And the dry down is completely dissimilar too, the dry down in this perfume is so delicious and complex. Not Another cherry is a lot more linear and not very good IMO. I think the cherry in this perfume is stronger in the first 30 minutes too. <br />
<br />
I really wish this perfume lasted longer though. I keep reapplying throughout the day and in a couple hours it's gone :( I don't know if I'd repurchase for that reason.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2251745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2251745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320626" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Joani_Cheddar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232228"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1232228.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Joani_Cheddar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rance-1795/Avant-le-Jour-16887.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16887.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Avant le Jour"title="Avant le Jour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232228">Joani_Cheddar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just because it has a note of cherry doesn't mean it smells like Tom Ford Lost Cherry.  Oye!  Yes the cherry is sour like TF, - this also has a plum note that stands out.  It is a tart fruit sweet fruit combo done in a fluffy airy way. TF is rum boozy this is wine like.  Very good for a celebrity fragrance. Her whole line is done well and at a great price point. This is similar to Bohoboco Red Wine Brown Sugar but in a teen setting. I like it. RATED Wine out of Ten</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2320626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2320626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="95861" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2248240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248240" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Spencemonster"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/454785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.454785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Spencemonster" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oakcha/Watermelon-Jam-93078.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93078.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Watermelon Jam"title="Watermelon Jam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/454785">Spencemonster</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Meh. <br />
Not bad. Not special at all. <br />
If you have lots of cherry scents (I do) this isn’t anything unique. Actually doesn’t even impress me. Doesn’t last. Did not wow me. I tried. But. Oh well. Sold it already. <br />
<br />
If you like cherry and don’t have many. I’d grab this if you want a cheapie. But. Not another cherry for the same price by Finery is better. 🥰👑</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2248240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2248240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246309" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kelhil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135046.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kelhil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Amore-Caffe-87409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amore Caffè"title="Amore Caffè"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046">kelhil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 20:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really excited from the Tiktok reviews I saw of people saying it smells less artificial than other cherry fragrances. I really don't know what they're smelling because to me, it smells more artificial than NAC by Finery and Lost Cherry by TF. That's not a bad thing, I like syrupy, cherry smells, but the cherry smell lasts approximately 30 minutes. After that, the only thing I get is a warm floral. It's much more floral than her other two, it doesn't seem to have the same base DNA in that if I didn't know it was part of the Sweet Tooth lineup, I probably wouldn't guess that. The warm floral lasts about 4 hours with moderate sillage on me, but it's very faintly on my skin 11 hours later. <br />
<br />
I did prep my skin with lotion prior to give it the best chance possible. I'm going to compare it to Lovefest Burning Cherry by Kayali because I suspect they might be similar, only I don't think CB has that same smoky note. Overall, I was disappointed because it doesn't wear all that well, even for a cheap fragrance. That's part of what I love about the first two. I think this completely missed the mark. <br />
<br />
ETA: Having smelled and now purchased YSL's Over Red, coming back to this fragrance is honestly painful. If you aren't a big Sabrina fan, I'd skip it entirely. There are so many other, better warm cherry fragrances out there. I'm only keeping it because I'm a fan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2246309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2246309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mattesha Erotica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448070"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1448070.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mattesha Erotica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Hypnose-170.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.170.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnôse"title="Hypnôse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448070">Mattesha Erotica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot stand miss Carpenter and refrained from buying her other releases, but once I heard she had released a cherry fragrance, I thought we could put our differences aside like REAL women, and this would be my opportunity to finally give one of her perfumes a try. Just like others here, I was SWINDLED by tiktokers swooning about how great this is.<br />
<br />
This perfume smells like a girl getting ready. Sticky waxy 90s lipstick mixed with using a hair straightener on freshly conditioned hair. Besides that, I cant put my finger on a single distinguishable note; it all just smells so muddled and gross if i was honest. The cherry here isnt the fun sultry cherry I enjoy, but rather that lipstick-y type stuffy cherry. The best part about this is how it seems to evaporate in minutes and is undetectable within a half hour, so you’re not stuck smelling like a chocolate covered cherry gummy bear and burnt hair concoction for long thankfully. My cap and bottle seem to be two distinct different shades of red and the atomizer feels cheap. Like her discography, this is just not a quality product.<br />
<br />
I knew better than to get anything by miss Carpenter, but my love of cherry frags clouded my judgment. When I saw her perfume manufacturer also makes Dolly Parton/Whitney Houston fragrances I was afraid of a questionable, end cap of the perfume isle in a department store type fragrance, and thats exactly what this is. Not trying to be a hater, this is just a bad perfume. 😅</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2247154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2247154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335753" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bblanka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073235.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bblanka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335753ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335753" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073235">bblanka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 11:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>artificial, bitter and sour cherry, just awful- but i generally hate cherry scents so if you enjoy them maybe you should try it… judging from the notes listed it looks quite nice tbh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2335753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2335753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346702" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hellsgemini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314674.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="hellsgemini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346702ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346702" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674">hellsgemini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was the most excited to try this scent out of the whole collection. Unfortunately, this was an absolute miss for me. The opening is extremely sour to me. Very rotten/bitter. After it dries down, it becomes a bearable warm cherry with the original Sweet Tooth base, but it might last for 30 minutes max. Just not worth it to me when their are better cherry scents out there. <br />
<br />
The notes sound so nice, but this just wasn't the one for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="95861"comment_id="2346702"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html?ccid=2346702#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="95861" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="95861":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="95861" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

    </div>

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>

    var lang = 'EN';
    $(document).ready(function () {
                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
